website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the industrial look, this is a good, affordable trash compactor.
pros: Freestanding unit that can be moved around
cons: Industrial look may not fit in with your kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The company first shipped it to the wrong address and 6 weeks later I recieved it It hasn't even completely crushed a bucket of plastic bottles and stopped working Checked for power and the interlock switch. It is something major Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exception product. Cut by trash by 75%
customer_reviews.text: Running a home business, I have a lot of trash and I exceed the town trash limits in terms of number of trash bags for the garbage collectors. I averaged 10 42 gallon trash bags (sometimes up to 14bags) a week and the town limit is 5 bags. My option was to pay $4 per extra bag or get a trash compactor. I got the Gladiator and what a terrific investment! Now my trash is average 3 bags, tops 4 bags. I am very pleased. Easy to use and it works.
customer_reviews.author: ForexTech

customer_reviews.title: Want to buy another
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding we went from 7 trash can bags (33 gallons) of trash a week to just 1 compactor bag and 1 trash can bag. We throw everything but food into ours, even glass. Only reason I give it 4 starts and not 5 is because I do not like the drawer when changing the bag. My wife was like really... do we need that and now she loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Shadowlord3

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Perfect for a garage and gets garbage out ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Perfect for a garage and gets garbage out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: FlexableFlyer

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Oh, yes!!! This is fantastic! Very well made. It is in my garage. I am on an island and am unable to get rid of garbage easily. With the compactor I can get much more into a bag and pay less to have it hauled off the island.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great Trash Compactor
customer_reviews.text: A little noisy but it is advertised as a garage unit so it is OK. It works great and compacts a full 30 gallon trash bag into a much smaller amount of trash. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Works great and love that it is portable
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised and no issued installing the wheels. Works great and love that it is portable.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was terrible only giving me a shipping label that I would ...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!!! It worked well first, for compacting only. The trash would get so compacted that you have to remove everything by hand thus defeating the purpose of having a compactor. Then it stopped working. I probably should not have given it two stars but it did compact at first you just could not remove the bag from the compactor without ripping it apart and then having to handle all the trash. Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Glover

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good shape, need to assemble casters
customer_reviews.text: One lost shipment, replacement required I contact shipper(s) for deliver. Confusing tracking info posted. Arrived in good shape, need to assemble casters. Caster lock mounting holes incorrect for one location of lock ( i. e. under unit not on the side). Unit does not compress as much as I would like but still useful. Over all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CEK

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and does a great job of compacting ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and does a great job of compacting garbage.Just make sure the bin is at least half full before compacting.Read the directions so you understand how to remove bag when it is full.There is a lever on the side of the bin that you have to release to remove full bag of compacted garbage otherwise it won't pull out. We bought cinch bags that work well with this unit which makes changing bags a lot easier then the bags that came with the unit.Very happy so far with the Gladiator and it is used daily.What we used to put in 4 garbage cans will now fit in 2 or less....
customer_reviews.author: GLP

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the open latch broke. Sent it back and the next ones door came off track. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Velena Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not enough compaction force.
customer_reviews.text: The compaction force is crap. I can compact my trash better if I stand on it. The foot only goes pushes the trash about 8 inches before it reverses and goes back up. It doesn't have an extra pack option.
customer_reviews.author: june anderson

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a brand new home that did not include a compactor. We have used several brands over the course of our 28 married years and this one is awesome! We have bought cheap brands and top of the line brands and this one, although marketed for garage, is the best compactor we have ever had. For a family of 5 we generate a good deal of trash. This has reduced our trash bulk by more than half! No more bulging trash containers or runs to find trash bins to dump overloading trash bags. This has literally been a game changer. Quietest.....no. Most attractive.......no. Best functioning for our large family. YES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Wise

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the reduction of mass trash. Expect the bag to be heavy. The drop down side makes it easy to unload. Looks great with my other gladiator products.
customer_reviews.author: C Baker

product_meta.title: Gladiator GACP15XXMG Modular Garage Trash Compactor
product_meta.description:
Now you can have all the benefits of a trash compactor without taking up valuable kitchen space. This Gladiator 15 in. compactor features rugged Gladiator brand styling, and casters for easy mobility. It is perfect for minimizing the volume of trash, decreasing the number of trash bags used, and reducing the number of trips to the curb.

AMAZON.COM
The Gladiator GarageWorks GACP15XXMG Modular Garage Trash Compactor provides all the benefits and convenience you're looking for in a heavy-duty compactor, without taking up valuable space. Featuring rugged styling, and complete with casters for easy mobility, this compactor minimizes the volume of trash to cut down on trash bags used and minimizes trips to the curb. 



Strong Enough to Reduce Garbage by 75 Percent
The Modular Garage Trash Compactor offers a 1.4-cubic-foot capacity, and it can be used to compress trash and recyclables, including aluminum cans, plastic bottles, and paper products. It creates a cleaner environment by keeping garbage and odors contained, and is an alternative to packing everything in trash bags. To dramatically reduce shop trash and handle heavy-duty compacting, this handy garage appliance comes equipped with a 1/3-horsepower motor with a compression ability of 2,200 pounds per square inch. You'll get a 4:1 compaction ratio and approximately 75% less garbage volume.

User-Friendly, Portable Design
Complete with a Touch Toe drawer opener that lets you open the compactor via a foot pedal, the Modular Garage Trash Compactor has a bin that opens smoothly on rails, even under the weight of heavy loads.

The compactor also includes solid rubber casters, which increase the overall stability of the unit and make it easier to move. The front casters lock with a simple push, and the swiveling rear casters let you move the unit easily around your garage.

Operation is simple thanks to the On/Off/Start key. And to help maintain smooth, trouble-free compacting, this unit has an automatic anti-jam feature that allows the compression ram to automatically reverse to prevent jams when the door is opened during operation.

The Modular Garage Trash Compactor is backed by a one-year limited warranty. 

What's in the Box
GACP15XXMG Trash Compactor with hammered granite cabinet finish and manual.







FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Gladiator Modular Garage Trash Compactor is a heavy-duty compactor strong enough to crush cans and other tough garage waste

See more
feature_bullets: Gladiator 1-cu ft portable trash compactor allows you to compress trash from anywhere in your home or garage
1/3-HP motor provides a compression force of 2,200 lbs. per sq in, reducing waste or recyclables to ¼ its original volume
Hammered granite finish features a rugged tread plate design that maintains durability and creates a modern look
Touch-Toe drawer opener offers a hands-free way to open the compactor
Recessed on/off/start control key creates a sleek, integrated look while providing safety
Automatic anti-jam allows for easy and reliable operation, even with a challenging load
Heavy-duty solid rubber casters offer easy mobility and lock to hold the unit in place
